Header: 62 Division Welcomes Its Newly-Promoted Major General Jayasinghe
Content: Troops of the 62 Division in a splendid felicitation ceremony rich with military formalities welcomed their newly-promoted General Officer Commanding Major General Dhammika Jayasinghe when he arrived there on Tuesday (3). The newly-promoted General Officer Commanding was offered a Guard Turnout and a Guard of Honour at the Headquarters premises of the 62 Division as a formality. Later on, he addressed a cross-section of the troops under his Division and attended an all rank tea. Commanders of 621, 622 and 623 Brigades, Senior Officers, Officers and a number of Other Ranks representing the 62 Division Headquarters and its under command battalions were present at the ceremony.
